Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaa Adhaik Kettapodhu, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththu, Rattu Uduththikkondu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Pravesiththu,

2 aramanai Visaarippukkaaranaagiya Eliyaakkeemaiyum, Sambiradhiyaagiya Sepnaavaiyum, Aasaariyargalin Moopparaiyum, Aamoththin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Ennum Theerkkadharisiyinidaththukku Rattu Uduththikkondavargalaaga Anuppinaan.
3 ivargal Avanai Nokki: Indha Naal Nerukkamum Kandidhamum Dhooshanamum Anubavikkira Naal; Pillaipperu Nokkiyirukkiradhu, Peravo Belanillai.

4 jeevanulla Dhevanai Nindhikkumpadi Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Than Aandavanaal Anuppappatta Rapsaakke Sonna Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Umadhu Dhevanaagiyakarththar Kettirukkiraar; Umadhu Dhevanaagiya Karththar Kettirukkira Vaarththaigalin Nimiththam Thandanai Seyvaar; Aagaiyaal Innum Meedhiyaayirukkiravargalukkaaga Vinnappancheyveeraaga Endru Esekkiyaa Sollachchonnaar Endraargal.
5 ivvidhamaai Esekkiyaa Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Esaayaavinidaththil Vandhu Sonnaargal.
6 appozhudhu Esaayaa Avargalai Nokki: Aseeriyaa Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Ennaith Dhooshiththadhum Neer Kettadhumaana Vaarththaigalinaale Bayappadaadheyum.

7 idho, Avan Oru Seydhiyaik Kettu, Than Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbuvadharkaana Aaviyai Naan Avanukkul Anuppi, Avanai Avan Dhesaththile Pattayaththaal Vizhappannuven Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Enbadhai Ungal Aandavanidaththil Sollungal Endraan.
8 aseeriyaa Raajaa Laageesaivittup Purappattaan Endru Kelvippattu, Rapsaakke Thirumbippoi, Avan Lipnaavinmel Yuththampannugiradhaik Kandaan.
9 idho, Eththiyoppiyaa Raajaavaagiya Theeraakkaa Ummodu Yuththampannap Purappattaan Endru Sollak Kelvippattaan; Appozhudhu Avan Thirumba Esekkiyaavinidaththukku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi:

10 neengal Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Erusalem Aseeriyaa Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappaduvadhillaiyendru Nee Nambiyirukkira Un Dhevan Unnai Eththa Ottaadhe.
11 idho, Aseeriyaa Raajaakkal Sagala Dhesangalaiyum Sangariththa Seydhiyai Nee Kettirukkiraaye, Nee Thappuvaayo?
12 en Pidhaakkal Azhiththuvitta Kosaanaiyum Aaraanaiyum Redhseppaiyum, Thelaasaarilirundha Edhenin Puththiraraiyum Avargaludaiya Dhevargal Thappuviththadhundo?
13 aamaaththin Raajaavum, Arpaaththin Raajaavum, Sepparvaayeem Enaa Eevaa Pattanangalin Raajaavum Enge? Endru Sollungal Endraan.
14 esekkiyaa Sthaanaapadhigalin Kaiyilirundhu Nirubaththai Vaangi Vaasiththa Pinbu, Avan Karththarin Aalayaththirkup Poi, Adhaik Karththarukku Munbaaga Viriththu,

15 karththarai Nokki: Kerubeengalin Maththiyil Vaasampannugira Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Oruvare Boomiyin Raajyangalukkellaam Dhevanaanavar; Neer Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakkineer.
16 karththaave, Umadhu Seviyai Saaiththuk Kelum; Karththaave, Neer Umadhu Kangalaith Thirandhupaarum; Sanakerip Jeevanulla Dhevanai Nindhikkumpadikku Solliyanuppina Vaarththaigalaik Kelum.
17 karththaave, Aseeriyaa Raajaakkal Andha Jaadhigalaiyum Avargal Dhesaththaiyum Naasamaakki,
18 avargaludaiya Dhevargalai Neruppile Pottuvittadhu Meydhaan; Avaigal Dhevargal Allave, Manushar Kaivelaiyaana Maramum Kallumdhaane; Aagaiyaal Avaigalai Nirththooliyaakkinaargal.
19 ippodhum Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Oruvare Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Boomiyin Raajyangal Ellaam Ariyumpadikku, Engalai Avan Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchiyum Endru Vinnappampanninaan.

20 appozhudhu Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Esekkiyaavukku Solliyanuppinadhu: Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakeripinnimiththam Nee Ennai Nokkip Pannina Vinnappaththaik Ketten.

21 avanaik Kuriththuk Karththar Sollugira Vasanamaavadhu: Seeyon Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kanniyaasthree Unnai Igazhndhu, Unnaip Parigaasampannugiraal; Erusalem Kumaaraththi Un Pinnaale Thalaiyaith Thulukkugiraal.
22 yaarai Nindhiththuth Dhooshiththaai? Yaarukku Virodhamaai Un Saththaththai Uyarththinaai? Nee Isravelin Parisuththarukku Virodhamaayallavo Un Kangalai Mettimaiyaaga Ereduththaai?

23 un Sthaanaapadhigalaik Kondu Nee Aandavarai Nindhiththu: En Radhangalin Thiralinaale Naan Malaigalin Kodumudigalukkum Leebanonin Sigarangalukkum Vandhu Erinen; Adhin Uyaramaana Kedhurumarangalaiyum, Uchchidhamaana Dhevadhaari Virutchangalaiyum Naan Vetti, Adhin Kadaiyaandharath Thaabaramattum, Adhin Sezhumaiyaana Vanamattum Varuven Endrum,
24 naan Anniyadhesangalil Kinaru Vetti Thanneer Kudiththen; En Ullankaalgalinaal Aranippaana Idangalin Agazhigalaiyellaam Varalavum Panninen Endrum Sonnaai.

25 naan Vegukaalaththirkumun Adhai Niyamiththu, Poorvanaatkal Mudhal Adhaith Thittampanninen Enbadhai Nee Kettadhillaiyo? Ippozhudhu Nee Aranaana Pattanangalaip Paazhaana Manmedugal Aakkumpadikku Naane Adhai Sambavikkappanninen.

26 adhinaale Avaigalin Kudigal Kaiyilaiththavargalaagi, Kalangi Vetkappattu, Veliyin Poondukkum, Pachchilaikkum, Veedugalinmel Mulaikkum Pullukkum, Ongivalarumun Theeyndhupogum Payirukkum Samaanamaanaargal.
27 un Iruppaiyum, Un Pokkaiyum, Un Varavaiyum, Nee Enakku Virodhamaaik Kondhalikkiradhaiyum Ariven.

28 nee Enakku Virodhamaaik Kondhaliththu, Veeriyam Pesinadhu En Sevigalil Erinapadiyinaal, Naan En Thurattai Un Mookkilum En Kadivaalaththai Un Vaayilum Pottu, Nee Vandhavazhiye Unnaith Thiruppikkondu Poven Endru Avanaikkuriththu Sollugiraar.

29 unakku Adaiyaalamaayiruppadhu Ennavendraal: Indha Varushaththile Thappip Payiraagiradhaiyum, Irandaam Varushaththile Thaanaai Vilaigiradhaiyum Saappiduveergal; Moondraam Varushaththilo Vidhaiththu Aruththu, Dhraatchaththottangalai Naatti, Avaigalin Kanigalaip Pusippeergal.
30 yoodhaa Vamsaththaaril Thappi Meendhirukkiravargal Marupadiyum Keezhe Verpatri Mele Kanikoduppaargal.
31 meedhiyaayirukkiravargal Erusalemilum, Thappinavargal Seeyon Malaiyilum Irundhu Purappaduvaargal; Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Vairaakkiyam Idhai Seyyum.

32 aagaiyaal Karththar Aseeriyaa Raajaavaikkuriththu: Avan Indha Nagaraththirkul Pravesippadhillai; Idhinmel Ambu Eyvadhumillai; Idharkumun Kedagaththode Varuvadhumillai; Idharku Edhiraagak Koththalam Poduvadhumillai.
33 avan Indha Nagaraththirkul Pravesiyaamal, Thaan Vandhavazhiye Thirumbippovaan.
34 en Nimiththamum En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Nimiththamum Naan Indha Nagaraththai Ratchikkumpadikku, Idharku Aadharavaayiruppen Enbadhaik Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Solliyanuppinaan.

35 andru Raaththiriyil Sambaviththadhu Ennavendraal: Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Purappattu, Aseeriyarin Paalayaththil Latchaththenbaththaiyaayiramperai Sangariththaan; Adhikaalame Ezhundhirukkum Podhu, Idho, Avargal Ellaarum Seththa Predhangalaaik Kidandhaargal.
36 appozhudhu Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakerip Prayaanappattu, Thirumbip Poi Niniveyil Irundhuvittaan.

37 avan Than Dhevanaagiya Nisrogin Kovilile Panindhukollugirapodhu, Avan Kumaararaagiya Adhramalekkum Saredhserum Avanaip Pattayaththinaal Vettippottu, Aararaath Dhesaththirkuth Thappi Odipponaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Esaaththon Avan Pattaththirku Vandhu Arasaandaan.
